mapper.select: SELECT A.DEP_CODE, A.DEP_NAME FROM H_DOC_DEPARTMENT A WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0
SELECT A.DOCNAME FROM H_DOC A WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND A.UUID = #{UUID}

SELECT A.UUID, A.DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, '%Y-%C-%D %H:%I:%S') AS CREATETIME, B.DOCNAME, C.DEP_NAME FROM H_SUBSCRIBE A LEFT JOIN H_DOC_DEPARTMENT C ON A.TYPE = C.DEP_CODE, H_DOC B WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND B.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND A.DOCID = B.UUID AND A.USERID = #{UUID}
AND A.CREATETIME BETWEEN #{BEGIN_CREATETIME} AND #{END_CREATETIME}
AND B.DOCNAME LIKE "%"#{DOCNAME}"%"
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 0
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 2
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 3
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 4
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM H_SUBSCRIBE A LEFT JOIN H_DOC_DEPARTMENT C ON A.TYPE = C.DEP_CODE, H_DOC B WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND B.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND A.DOCID = B.UUID AND A.USERID = #{UUID}
AND A.CREATETIME BETWEEN #{BEGIN_CREATETIME} AND #{END_CREATETIME}
AND B.DOCNAME LIKE "%"#{DOCNAME}"%"
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 0
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 2
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 3
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 4
AND A.DIAGNOSE_STATUS = 1

SELECT A.UUID, A.DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, '%Y-%C-%D %H:%I:%S') AS CREATETIME, B.DOCNAME, B.UUID AS DOCUUID, C.DEP_NAME FROM H_SUBSCRIBE A LEFT JOIN H_DOC_DEPARTMENT C ON A.TYPE = C.DEP_CODE, H_DOC B WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND B.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND A.DOCID = B.UUID AND A.UUID = #{UUID}

SELECT A.UUID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, '%Y-%C-%D %H:%I:%S') AS CREATETIME, B.UUID AS DOCUUID, B.DOCNAME, C.DEP_NAME FROM H_DIAGNOSE A LEFT JOIN H_DOC_DEPARTMENT C ON A.DISEASETYPE_CODE = C.DEP_CODE, H_DOC B WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND B.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND A.DOCID = B.UUID AND A.SUBSCRIBEID = #{UUID}
